pr_title: SAK-44776 use the submitNoCheck hidden button like auto-save does to submit at end

timeline.message: SAK-44730 use the submitNoCheck hidden button like auto-save does to submit at end

timeline.bodyText: question for @dnhutchins : why is this code starting at line 317 so different from the block of code at line 296?
timeline.author: ottenhoff

timeline.bodyText: I'm not too familiar with this code. Conceptually it makes sense. Would it be appropriate to move this submitNoCheck click into the leaveAssessment() routine?
timeline.author: bjones86

replies.bodyText: i think leaveAssessment() is for when the assessment was already submitted by the back-end java timer
replies.author: ottenhoff
